conversion_verification.notes: The 3D model successfully translates the 2D plan into an isometric cutaway with clear vertical volume.

3d_conversion_fundamentals.notes: Excellent 3D projection. Walls have consistent height and thickness. Floors and volumes are clearly defined.

geometric_accuracy.notes: High fidelity to the original layout. All rooms (Bed 1-4, Living/Dining, Kitchen, Bathrooms) and balcony spaces are correctly positioned and proportional.

interior_elements.notes: Furniture placement matches the plan precisely, including the difficult diagonal kitchen counter and specific bedroom layouts.

visual_clarity.notes: Clean rendering. Minus 2 points for minor artifacts on the balcony railing and slight text contamination ('BET') in the center.

detected_errors.description: Ghosting of room label text ('BET') visible on the bedroom floor.
Outer terrace railing geometry is slightly segmented compared to the smooth curves of the plan.

summary: An exceptionally faithful 3D conversion that preserves the exact geometry and furniture layout of the architectural original with high clarity.
